body: It's amazing how often i see translators using the word scrap in places where its unnatural, the definition of scrape is To remove (an outer layer, for example) from a surface by forceful strokes of an edged or rough instrument: eg "scraped the wallpaper off before painting the wall". So when i see something like on page 2 were he says "you want me to scrape your hungry pussy" it always looks weird af. the correct word one should use in that sentence would be rub or fuck but scrape isn't right. Not much point in writing this here but I wanted to say my piece.
